</p>
<h1 align="center">Chess.com Skin for Lichess</h1>
<p align="center">Chess.com Skin for Lichess is a browser extension that replace Lichess's board, pieces & sound effects with Chess.com's.</p>

<div align="center">
  <a href="https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/chesscom-skin-for-lichess/">

      <source srcset="https://i.imgur.com/ZluoP7T.png" media="(prefers-color-scheme: dark)">

    </picture>
